response.overview: The feature film "One Hundred Years of Monica" was made from conversations with Mónica Echeverría Yáñez (writer, playwright, actress, literature professor, a very important woman in Chilean national culture and the Ibero-American world), recorded between 2014 and 2020. From these narratives, the "fiction" was born, inserting the dialogues into the film script.
response.title: Cien Años De Mónica Con
